actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Oversight and Courts.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Administrative Oversight and the Courts

official_title: A bill to convert a temporary Federal judgeship in the district of Hawaii to a permanent judgeship, to authorize an additional permanent judgeship in the district of Hawaii, extend statutory authority for magistrate positions in Guam and the Northern Mariana Islands, and for other purposes.
subjects: Advice and consent of the Senate

summary.text: Converts a temporary Federal judgeship in the district of Hawaii to a permanent judgeship. Directs the President to appoint, by and with the advice and consent of the Senate, one additional district judge for the district of Hawaii. Provides permanent statutory authority for magistrate positions in the district courts of Guam and the Northern Mariana Islands.

titles.title: A bill to convert a temporary Federal judgeship in the district of Hawaii to a permanent judgeship, to authorize an additional permanent judgeship in the district of Hawaii, extend statutory authority for magistrate positions in Guam and the Northern Mariana Islands, and for other purposes.
